DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose research demonstrate therapeutic effect diabetes , pre-diabetes metabolic syndrome implement well-formulated low carbohydrate lifestyle program .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose research demonstrate therapeutic effect implement well-formulated low carbohydrate lifestyle program . This represent improved glycemic control diabetic without use additional medication purpose failure progress diabetes individual pre-diabetes metabolic syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Body weight/Diabetes : Diagnosis type2 diabetes BMI > 25 ( without endorgan failure ) Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dL HbA1c > 6.5 Body weight/ Prediabetes : Diagnosis metabolic syndrome BMI > 30 HbA1c > 5.6 ( note : apply usual care control subject ) Ethnicity : ethnic group BMI < 30 without diagnosis Type2 diabetes , metabolic syndrome Type 1 diabetes History ketoacidosis History MI , stroke , angina , coronary insufficiency within last 6 month Diabetic retinopathy require treatment Creatinine > 2.0 Urinary albumin > 1 g/d Impaired hepatic function ( Bilirubin > 2 , Albumin < 3.5 ) Cholelithiasis biliary dysfunction Cancer require treatment past 5 year , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer Chronic infectious disease require ongoing treatment Other chronic disease condition likely limit lifespan < 6 year NonEnglish speaking Unable unwilling participate group session ( e.g. , plan relocate within next year ) conform carbohydrate restrict diet lifestyle ( e.g. , food intolerance , religious personal restriction ) Weight loss > 10 % past 6 month Currently pregnant nursing , plan become pregnant study Major psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , schizophrenia , bipolar disorder ) currently uncontrolled Excessive alcohol intake ( acute chronic ) define average consumption 3 alcoholcontaining beverage daily consumption 14 alcoholic beverage per week
